question: Q: You’re hosting a sleepover with Meepo, and you decided to watch anime! What will you guys choose?
Q: Look! A Meepo Candy & Sweets Shop has arrived in the city! You and Prixie will check it out, what do you think she’s gonna order?
Q: You’re having some art classes in Aiko University, who’s your favorite teacher?
Q: You’re having a date with Prixie but suddenly it starts raining! What would you do?
choices: Use your jacket and protect her
Spend 150 Meepo Coins to buy a nice umbrella in a nearby shop
You put Prixie on your shoulders and run away to a place with no rain
Steal a nearby car to seek shelter from rain

question: Q: What do you think Meepo does in his free time?
